Name: Toxic Spikes
Effect: Target Foe's side of the Field. Entry Hazard. Foes who enter the battlefield become Poisoned. Roll 1 Chance Die for them to become Badly Poisoned instead. Pokemon with immunity to Ground-Type Moves are not affected.
Description: The user lays a trap of scattered poison spikes that attach to the opponent's feet leaving them with a bad case of fever.
